name: DJ Shadow
description:
'''Joshua Paul Davis''' (born June 29, 1972), better known by his stage name '''DJ Shadow''', is an American DJ and record producer. His debut studio album, ''[[Endtroducing.....]]'', was released in 1996.
He uses layered production with numerous samples. He was described in [[AllMusic]] as having "revolutionized hip-hop".

He was also formerly of the band [[Unkle]] (1996â€“1999).
